item.title: Trump criticizes United Nations, world leaders in General Assembly
item.description: President Donald Trump is speaking at the United Nations General Assembly, as world leaders convene in New York for the body's 80th session.

item.title: WATCH: Coach struck by stray bullet during Texas youth baseball game
item.description: A coach was shot at a youth baseball game in Texas when people nearby were taking target practice and fired into the field, authorities said.

item.title: 5 teenagers wounded in El Paso shooting at an apartment complex
item.description: Officials say five teenagers have been wounded in a shooting at an apartment complex in El Paso, Texas

item.title: LIVE: Pres. Trump addresses the United Nations General Assembly
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Harris admits she was 'reckless' in not challenging Biden decision to seek reelection
item.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris, on "Good Morning America," said she does regret not challenging former President Biden's decision to run for reel...
